Week 1: Introduction to styles in Microsoft Word

| Self-study Activity | Time | Resources |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Watch a video tutorial on the basic features of styles in Word | 15-30 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, internet connection, video tutorial |
| Complete a self-assessment quiz to test understanding of the concepts learned | 15-30 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, internet connection, self-assessment quiz |
| Practice applying different styles in a Word document | 30-45 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, sample Word document |
| Identify and customize the default styles in a Word document | 30-45 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, sample Word document |

Week 2: Understanding the purpose of using styles

| Self-study Activity | Time | Resources |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Read about the benefits of using styles in Word documents | 15-30 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, internet connection, article on benefits of using styles |
| Watch a video tutorial on the benefits of using styles | 15-30 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, internet connection, video tutorial |
| Create a document using styles to maintain consistency | 30-45 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, sample Word document |
| Evaluate the use of styles in a sample Word document to identify any issues | 30-45 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, sample Word document |

Week 3: Applying styles in Word

| Self-study Activity | Time | Resources |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Practice creating a document using styles | 30-45 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, sample Word document |
| Watch a video tutorial on how to create a new style in Word | 15-30 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, internet connection, video tutorial |
| Create a new style in a Word document | 30-45 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, sample Word document |
| Apply the new style in a Word document | 30-45 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, sample Word document |

Week 4: Enhancing accessibility and structure with styles

| Self-study Activity | Time | Resources |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Watch a video tutorial on how to create an accessible PDF from a Word document | 15-30 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, internet connection, video tutorial |
| Create an accessible PDF from a Word document using styles | 30-45 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, sample Word document |
| Evaluate the accessibility of a Word document and suggest improvements | 30-45 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, sample Word document |
| Design and implement a new set of styles in a Word document to improve its accessibility and structure | 30-45 minutes | Laptop/computer with Microsoft Word installed, sample Word document |

This table provides an overview of the self-study activities, time, and resources required for students to complete each activity. With the help of this table, students can plan their self-study time effectively and have a clear understanding of the resources they need to be successful.
